name: Biodiversity Genomics Europe (BGE)
description: Access resources on DNA barcoding and genome sequencing, and find information on conservation initiatives and citizen science opportunities.

name: European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA)
description: Find out more about the European effort to sequence and generate high-quality reference genomes for all of Europe's eukaryotic life.

name: National Biodiversity Data Centre (NBDC)
description: Find Irelandâ€™s biodiversity data, as well as educational resources on species identification and conservation efforts across the country.

name: Botanical Society of Britain and Ireland (BSBI)
description: Explore resources for studying wild plants, access plant distribution data and find information on how to get involved in botanical surveys and conservation activities across Britain and Ireland.
